page.title: 01NORTH WEST LEICESTER
page.content: The 12 sq. kil. block to the NW of Leicester includes inner city & urban landscape,mid 50's housing developments,farmland & abrand new development scheme of housing,light industry & recreational & shopping complexes situated at Beaumont Leys. This kaleidoscopic mixture of back to back terraced houses & decaying heavy industrial sites,residential suburbia & new development gradually moves to open space & woods & fields encompasses a variety of peoples of differing races,creeds,lifestyles,ethnic backgrounds & religions. The area is now a major growth focal point & Beaumont Leys reflects new trends in planning with its mixture of housing,facilities,& industry all set in pleasant rural surroundings.
